stu_tags: RESPECTED  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Keiji is literally the best teacher I\'ve had here at Wesleyan. He is funny and truly cares about your work. I took his printmaking course and loved it. He is also very talented.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I have taken several classes with Keiji. He is pretty much awesome. If you are willing to do the work, which is not overwhelming, then you will love his courses. He is very helpful and enthusiastic. He also understand that printmaking is not everyone\'s medium of choice. He will work with your individual style.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Keiji is amazing. He is an incredible and accomplished printmaker. He will not force anything on you, which makes the class environment very laid back, but he\'s ready to show you anything if you are. Also, maybe the kindest person ever.
